page.title: 17Special Events
page.content: {Clubs. }Clubs for the children include Brownies,Guides,Scouts and Guides.A Youth Club and Young Farmers Club are run for children.Salehurst Primary School has a Gym Club.Adults join the Working Men's Club,Womens Institute, Young Wives Club,Keep Fit Club,Mothers Union,Archeological Society,Cricket Club and British legion. {Education. }The two schools provide a Sports day,Christmas Concert,Jumble Sale,Childrens Disco,School Fete and Adults Dances every year. {Religion. }A flower festival is held at Salehurst church,there is a Sunday Club for children and annual events include Rememberence Day Parade and the Harvest supper. {Social Concerns. }There is a Footpath Society and a Young Ornathologists Club.Proceeds from the Carnival go towards the Community Association.
